#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;

int prime(int a){
    if (a % 2 == 0){
        return -1;
    }
    int b = sqrt(a);
    int j = 3;
    for (j = 3; j <= b; j+=2){
            if (a%j == 0){
                return -1;
            }
    }
    return a;
}

int main(){
int a[100000]  = {2};
int k = 2;
int b[1000];
int b1 = 0;
for (int i = 3; i <100000;i+=2){
    int temp;
    temp = prime(i);
    if (i==temp){
        a[k+1] = temp;
    if (a[k-1] == (a[k-2]+a[k])/2  ){
       b[b1] = a[k-1];
       b1++;
    }
        k++;
    }
}
int cases=0;
cin>> cases;
int inp[cases + 1];
for (int s = 0 ; s< cases ; s++ ){
    cin>>inp[s];
}
for  (int s=0 ;s<cases;s++){
   cout<<b[inp[s]-1]<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
